briefTitle: Comparison of Bowel Cleansing Efficacy Between Same-day Dose Versus Split Dose

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* all subjects who undergo colonoscopy for various reasons.

Exclusion Criteria:

* hemodynamic instability
* ileus or bowel obstruction
* active inflammatory bowel disease
* advanced colon cancer

outcomeMeasures.title: Boston Bowel Preparation Scale
outcomeMeasures.description:
Primary endpoint=Successful bowel cleansing (all segmental score 2 or above)

\* Boston bowel preparation scale (0-9) Sum of 3 segment of bowel. 0=inadequate

1. poor
2. good
3. excellent
